title: Syntax Adapters
description: Developer-facing layers that provide convenient syntax (Sugar) compiling to standard protocols.

items.name: JSX Adapter
items.desc: Converts JSX syntax into standard template and slot structures.

items.desc: Allows writing functional-style components that map to class-based Web Components.

title: Library Adapters
description: Implementation layers that bridge third-party ecosystem libraries to Web Blocks protocols.

items.desc: Connects the Mousetrap library to the Keyboard Shortcuts Module.
